item.title: 伊利诺伊州州长普利兹克宣布，假释委员会主席和成员辞职，他们负责监督一名被控刺伤前女友并杀害其子、11 岁的杰登-珀金斯（Jayden Perkins）的男子的假释。
item.description:
Illinois Gov. Pritzker has announced the resignation of the parole board chair and member who oversaw parole for a man accused of stabbing an-ex-girlfriend and killing her son, 11-year-old Jayden Perkins. https://t.co/laGqlE7Z75

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 海岸警卫队官员说，在弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌现场的紧急搜寻工作仍在继续，仍有六人下落不明。马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，坍塌发生时，工人们正在桥上修补坑洞。
item.description:
Six people remain unaccounted for as the desperate search continues at the site of the Francis Scott Key Bridge collapse, Coast Guard officials said. Workers were on the bridge working on potholes at the time of the collapse, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/FAj5rlpQgi

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.description:
The Singapore-flagged cargo ship, Dali, spans a length of 984 feet and a width of 157 feet, a listing showed. It holds 22 crew members, all of whom are based in India.

item.title: 一段视频显示了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在周二早些时候被一艘货轮撞击后倒入巴尔的摩港帕塔普斯科河的瞬间。
item.description:
A video shows the moment Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge collapsed into the Patapsco River in the Port of Baltimore after it was struck by a cargo ship early Tuesday. https://t.co/ygt3WsWPM8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 官员说，一艘驶离巴尔的摩港的大型货轮撞上了弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥 1.6 英里长的一根支撑柱，造成部分坍塌，车辆和人员被卷入水中。@Flipboard ➡️ 上有完整报道。
item.description:
A massive cargo ship leaving the Baltimore harbor crashed into a support column of the 1.6-mile long Francis Scott Key Bridge, causing a partial collapse and sending vehicles and people into the water, officials said.

Complete coverage on @Flipboard ➡️https://t.co/5Y681TPHsq

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在纽约的封口费刑事案件的法官批准了曼哈顿地区检察官的请求，对这位前总统下达了有限的封口令。

item.title: 在上周的抽奖中没有人中奖后，"百万大奖 "的头奖奖金增至 11 亿美元。下一次开奖时间是美国东部时间周二晚 11 点。如果周二晚上中奖，这将是该游戏历史上第五大巨奖。
item.description:
The Mega Millions jackpot swelled to $1.1 billion after no winners were selected in last week's drawing. The next drawing is Tuesday night at 11 p.m. ET.

item.title: 请看视频显示了一艘巨型货轮撞上弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥的瞬间，造成巴尔的摩港几乎完全坍塌。
item.description:

item.title: 卡桑德拉-"卡西"-文图拉（Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura）的前搭档肖恩-"迪迪"-康姆斯（Sean "Diddy" Combs）在洛杉矶和迈阿密的住所于周一遭到联邦特工突袭的消息传出后，她发表了自己的看法。
item.description:
Cassandra "Cassie" Ventura is speaking out following news that her former partner Sean "Diddy" Combs' Los Angeles and Miami homes were raided by federal agents on Monday. https://t.co/5S79hYfrjs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统就巴尔的摩大桥垮塌事件发表讲话，他对居民说："只要需要，我们就会与你们在一起。
item.description:
Pres. Biden gave remarks on the Baltimore bridge collapse, telling residents "we're going to stay with you as long as it takes."

Biden, who noted he's been over the bridge many times, said he plans to visit Baltimore as soon as possible. https://t.co/7UV4FBJHaT pic.twitter.com/g52jEQjEZc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）说，在一艘巨型货轮撞上支撑柱之前，官员们阻止了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥上的车流，帮助挽救了灾难中的生命。
item.description:
Officials were able to stop the flow of traffic onto the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore before a massive cargo ship crashed into a support column, helping to save lives in the disaster, Maryland Gov. Wes Moore said. https://t.co/pqiyX0oxOs

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统说："这无疑拯救了生命"。
item.description:
LATEST: Personnel on the ship alerted the Maryland Department of Transportation that they lost control of the vessel, and local authorities were able to close the bridge before it was struck, "which undoubtedly saved lives," Pres. Biden said.https://t.co/jHtm617UkH pic.twitter.com/nYPdJCWBPt

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据研究人员称，全球气温上升可能会改变世界上大部分葡萄酒的生产地，因为中纬度地区可能无法再种植葡萄。
item.description:
Rising global temperatures could change where the majority of the world's wine is produced as mid-latitude regions may no longer be able to grow grapes, according to researchers. https://t.co/ioIn3t2gkr

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024
